query.statement:
SELECT '' CHK, '' FLAG, A.NAM, A.BDT, A.SEQ, A.ARA, A.BSU, A.POS, A.JOB, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT,'CS_LIF_JOB', A.JOB) AS JOB_NM, A.TEL, A.IDT, A.ODT, A.SID, A.EDT, A.EYN, A.CRT, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT, 'VKGRP', A.VKGRP) VKGRP_NM, SAPHEE.CODE_CONV(A.MANDT, 'VKBUR', SUBSTR(A.VKGRP,1,2)||'00') VKBUR_NM, A.SGB, A.CDT, A.EML, A.SIZ, ABR_NM, (WMONTH/12 )||'³â'||(MOD( WMONTH,12) )||'°³¿ù' AS EMP_PERIOD FROM ( SELECT A.MANDT, A.CS100_NAM NAM, A.CS100_BDT BDT, A.CS100_SEQ SEQ, B.LGORT BSU, B.BSU_ARA ARA, A.CS100_POS POS, A.CS100_JOB JOB, A.CS100_TEL TEL, A.CS100_IDT IDT, A.CS100_ODT ODT, A.CS100_SID SID, A.CS100_EDT EDT, A.CS100_EYN EYN, A.CS100_CRT CRT, B.VKGRP VKGRP, A.CS100_GBN SGB, A.CS100_CDT CDT, A.CS100_EML EML, A.CS100_SIZ SIZ, B.ABR_NM ABR_NM, SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(A.CS100_IDT,HEX(CURRENT DATE),2) WMONTH FROM SAPHEE.ZCST100 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS100_LIF = B.LIFNR AND B.LGORT > '' AND A.CS100_LIF IN ( #LIFNR+# ) AND A.CS100_IDT > '' AND A.CS100_ODT = ''
) A ORDER BY A.BSU, A.JOB WITH UR
